ai-mil7.6.2:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors for a dragon?”
ai-mil7.6.2:1.2_0: “As far as the wheel-turning monarch does not give up his life, nor does he give it up.
ai-mil7.6.2:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator should properly application to the life as far as guarding proper attention.
ai-mil7.6.2:1.4_0: This is the first kind of wheel-turning monarch.
ai-mil7.6.2:2.1_0: Furthermore, a wheel-turning monarch is content with what is content, and does not get to do so.
ai-mil7.6.2:2.2_0: In the same way, when someone with good friends, companions, and associates, not all those that have gained confidence. ...
ai-mil7.6.2:2.3_0: this is the second offering to the wheel-turning monarch.
ai-mil7.6.2:3.1_0: Furthermore, the wheel-turning monarch does not hurt any living creatures.
ai-mil7.6.2:3.2_0: In the same way, when you’re shaved by the rod and the sword. You’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-mil7.6.2:3.3_0: This is the third kind of wheel-turning monarch.
ai-mil7.6.2:3.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about this matter
ai-mil7.6.2:4.2_0: don’t conquer or encourage others to conquer,
ai-mil7.6.2:4.3_0: with love for all living creatures—
ai-mil7.6.2:4.4_0: you’ll have no enmity for anyone.’”
ai-mil7.6.2:5.1_0: The second enquiry belonging to a wheel-turning monarch.
